# `r m`

#### Train Metrics

```{r, echo=F, results='asis'}

display_cm = function(results, positive = 'yes') {
  n = grep("obs", names(results), value=T, invert = T)
  yesify = function(x){factor(ifelse(x > .5, 'yes', 'no'), levels=c('yes', 'no'))}
  cm = .format_cm(n[1], confusionMatrix(yesify(results[,n[1]]), results$obs, positive='yes'), results$obs, results[[n[1]]])

  if(length(n) > 1){
    for(i in 2:length(n)){
      cm = rbind(cm, .format_cm(n[i], confusionMatrix(yesify(results[,n[i]]), results$obs, positive=positive), results$obs, results[[n[i]]]))
    }
  }
  return(cm)
}

.format_cm = function(label, cM, obs, probs){
  .f1 = function(x) {return(round(as.vector(x), 4))} # Formatting function 1
  .rmse = function(obs, probs){
    obs = ifelse(obs == 'yes', 1, 0)
    sqrt(sum((obs - probs)^2)/length(obs))
  }
  .cor = function(obs, probs){
    obs =ifelse(obs == 'yes', 1, 0)
    cor(obs, probs)
  }
  out = data.frame(Model = toupper(label),
                   TP = cM$table['yes', 'yes'],
                   FP = cM$table['yes', 'no'],
                   TN = cM$table['no', 'no'],
                   FN = cM$table['no', 'yes'],
                   Accuracy = .f1(cM$overall['Accuracy']),
                   Kappa = .f1(cM$overall['Kappa']),
                   RMSE = .f1(.rmse(obs, probs)),
                   r = .f1(.cor(obs, probs)),
                   Sensitivity = .f1(cM$byClass['Sensitivity']),
                   Specificity = .f1(cM$byClass['Specificity']),
                   PPV = .f1(cM$byClass['Pos Pred Value']),
                   NPV = .f1(cM$byClass['Neg Pred Value']),
                   Prevalence = .f1(cM$byClass['Prevalence']),
                   Detection = .f1(cM$byClass['Detection Rate']))
  return( out )
}

# test-metric
knitr::kable(display_cm(results$train))
```

#### Train Comparison

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

binify = function(x, breaks = 20){
  inc = 1 / breaks
  out = as.integer(cut(x, breaks=seq(0,1,inc), labels=seq(1,breaks)))
  return(out)
}
bucketify = function(results, positive = 'yes', negative = 'no'){

  n = grep("^obs$", names(results), value=T, invert = T)

  fill_missing = function(x, nums = 1:20){
    missing_nums = nums[!nums %in% x$bin]
    if(length(missing_nums)){
      newrows = data.frame(bin = missing_nums,
                           percent = rep("", length(missing_nums)),
                           n = rep("", length(missing_nums)))
      x = rbind(x, newrows)
      x = x[order(x$bin),]
    }
    x
  }

  add_rownames = function(x){cbind(data.frame(bin = as.integer(row.names(x))), x)}
  bins = lapply(results[,n], function(x, obs)(x %>% binify %>%
                                                as.data.frame %>%
                                                cbind(obs) %>%
                                                table %>%
                                                as.data.frame.matrix %>%
                                                add_rownames %>%
                                                mutate(total = yes + no) %>%
                                                mutate(percent = yes / total * 100) %>%
                                                round %>%
                                                mutate(percent = ifelse(percent == 0, "", paste0(percent, "% "))) %>%
                                                mutate(n = ifelse(total == 0, "", paste0("(", total, ")"))) %>%
                                                select(bin, percent, n) %>% fill_missing %>%
                                                mutate(x = paste0(percent, n)) %>%
                                                select(x)), results$obs)

  for(n in names(bins)){
    names(bins[[n]]) <- gsub("_PROB", "", toupper(n))
  }
  bins = as.data.frame(bins)

  #select (percent, n))
  bins = cbind(data.frame(bin = paste(seq(0,95, 5), "-", seq(5,100, 5), "%", sep="")), bins)
  return(bins)
}

knitr::kable(bucketify(results$train))
```
